full_summary:
### F1700-230554 CCG Victoria Base Cladding Remediation Phase 2
#### Procurement Reference: WS4340330506-Doc4444377797
#### Solicitation Number: WS4340330506

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), Canadian Coast Guard, is issuing this Request for Proposal for the cladding, windows, lighting, and door remediations at the Helicopter hangar, Workshops, and Buoy maintenance buildings at the Canadian Coast Guard Base, located at 25 Huron Street, Victoria, British Columbia.

Départ YESJV Éd but DON!!!

This is the Phase 2 solicitation, following an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers who had pre-qualified under the initial Invitation to Qualify process have been invited to submit a proposal.

### Contract Details

* Tender Closing Date: 12 March 2024, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
* Expected Contract End Date: 31 March 2025
* Regions of Operation: British Columbia
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

### Proposal Requirements

The project includes targeted cladding remediation, window repairs, lighting upgrades, and door replacements at the specified buildings. Suppliers are expected to provide a comprehensive plan outlining their proposed solutions, addressing specific requirements as outlined in the solicitation. Furthermore, all suppliers must adhere to the requirements set forth in the Contract Health and Safety Program and the Canadian Environmental Protection Act.

### Posturing and Evaluation

A Request for Proposal (RFP) evaluation process will be conducted based on the Lowest Price (LP) criteria. Respondents are expected to provide all necessary documentation as specified in the solicitation.

### Contacts

* Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Authority Contact: Dumay, Clara (SPAC/PSPC) at [clara.dumay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:clara.dumay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* End-User Contact: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) at [200 Kent Street,Ottawa,Ontario,K1A 0E6,Canada](http://200 Kent Street,Ottawa,Ontario,K1A 0E6,Canada)

**Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Appendices

None.
